title: Microsoft | L61 | Hyderabad
content:
**Education:** One of the top IIITs
**Years of Experience:** 2.2 Years
**Prior Experience:** SDE-1 at a non FAANG, Tier 1.5 
**Current:** 15.5L Base + 1.5L Bonus + $10K annually(Vesting over 3 years)
**Total Current:** 22.5L (Also including 1/3 Joining RSU reward)

**Date of the Offer:** September 2024
**Company:** Microsoft
**Title/Level:** L61
**Location:** Hyderabad
**Salary:** 25L
**Relocation/Signing Bonus:** 1L (No relocation as I am based in Hyd)
**Stock bonus:** $35K (Vesting over 4 years)
**Bonus:** ~10% annually = 2.5L
**Annual Refresher stocks** 10K (Vesting over 5 years)
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Refresher):** 36.45L
**Benefits:** Standard microsoft benefits

**Note:**
I understand that this is an extremely low offer for an L61 position. I did try to negotiate with the HR but she didn't budge. Also, by this november I would've gotten my annual hike and my base would have gone upto 17.5 or 18 but she wasn't considering it, plus I did not have any other offer to negotiate with aswell.
I have accepted the offer, although it's a lowball for L61 but I believe getting an SDE-2 role at 2.2 years of experience is a good jump. 

* What are your thoughts?
* Also, can anyone share the avg. annual hike an L61 gets at microsoft along with annual RSU reward(Refreshers)? I'm not confident on the numbers I know.

**Interview Experience:** https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5864184/Microsoft-or-L61-or-Hyderabad

title: Zepto SDE 3 | Bangalore
content:

current comp - **~60L (50 base + 5 bonus + 5 RSU)**
current company - Startup (recently went public)
